text: Yingda International Trust Co., Ltd. is a Chinese trust company and asset management firm that was majority owned by State Grid Corporation of China (via State Grid Yingda Group for 89.76% stake). Yingda Trust was founded in March 1987, as Jinan International Trust and Investment Corporation. Yingda Trust owned Yingda Asset Management for 49% stake. The company was headquartered in Jinan, but in 2010 moved to Beijing. ==Shareholders== * State Grid Corporation of China (via State Grid Yingda Group and its subsidiary, via State Grid Shanghai): 93.60% * Jinan Development and Reform Commission (via indirect subsidiary Jinan Energy Investment): 4.38% * Jigang Group: 1.10%2015 Annual Filing of Yingda International Trust National Enterprise Credit Information Publicity System (in Chinese) * (): 0.92% The share capital of Yingda International Trust had increase from to approximately in 2012, which was entirely subscribed by State Grid Yingda Group. Yingda Group also acquired 4.67% stake from sister company East China Grid on 27 March 2012 and from Jinan 3F () in 2013. ==See also== * Shandong International Trust ==References== ==External links== * Category:State Grid Corporation of China Category:Financial services companies of China Category:Private equity firms of China Category:Companies based in Beijing Category:Companies based in Jinan Category:Chinese companies established in 1987 Category:Government-owned companies of China
title: Yingda International Trust
